title: Riot clearly didn't learn their lesson with Pantheon and TF
body: Once again we have a fully global ult (ANYWHERE on the map, regardless of how far away it is) in the form of Rek'Sai.

replies.body: So we are all in agreement that cloud273 has no idea what he is talking about then? aye.
The problem is not that its global, the problem is that its a low ass fucking cooldown and she can also run Teleport even as a jungler.

anywhere sounds like more than it actually is though, you need a fucking tunnle for the ult, which means that you need to have been there befor+no enemy did pass that area since than, which ends in a far more limited mobillity than twisted or pant have.
Rek's ult does no damage. It makes her run to the nearest tunnel entrance. If she gets hit by a skill shot or aoe it breaks the channel too
